text:
Q: Shape intersection design A:

It's not relevant here. I suppose it is something like multi dispatching (recently has known about this term thank to @Pepjin). So this task is not how to implement intersect(A, B) but how to provide a design which has the criteria in the OP. You can replace intersect two shapes with cross two species, or mix two potions, they are all isomorphic in this context.

Q: Running Spark-Shell on Windows A:

That's an old guide for spark 1.3.

Please use this guide to set up spark on Windows.

http://www.ics.uci.edu/~shantas/Install_Spark_on_Windows10.pdf

This guide uses Maven and you are going to use sbt but nevertheless you will be able to execute spark-shell with this guide.

Q: How Will Joomla work with MariaDB? A:

Enter localhost:3305 as hostname.

Q: is there a type definition similar to the oracle rowtype in mysql A:

Unfortunately, no ROWTYPE or the like behaviour on MySQL. Perhaps in a future, but in 2022 this feature remains not developed. So we must continue declaring tons of variables in order to manage cursor data... :`(

See related link on MySQL dev forum at High Level Architecture tab
